thread.title: Boston Red Sox' David Ortiz plays NFL DraftKings, tells Patriots' Rob Gronkowski 'Don't let me down, bro'
thread.title_full: Boston Red Sox' David Ortiz plays NFL DraftKings, tells Patriots' Rob Gronkowski 'Don't let me down, bro'

author: Christopher Smith | csmith@masslive.com
title: Boston Red Sox' David Ortiz plays NFL DraftKings, tells Patriots' Rob Gronkowski 'Don't let me down, bro'
text:
comments Boston Red Sox' David Ortiz plays NFL DraftKings, tells Patriots' Rob Gronkowski 'Don't let me down, bro' David Ortiz Boston Red Sox designated hitter David Ortiz before a game at Fenway Park in Boston on April 27 (AP Photo/Charles Krupa) (AP Photo/Charles Krupa) Comments 
The pressure is on ... 
Red Sox DH David Ortiz tweeted to New England Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski to tell him he has him in his DraftKings' lineup and not to let him down: Yo @RobGronkowski , I got you on my draftKings lineup today good luck and dont let me down bro!!! haha http://t.co/G1GpgaSF9n â€” David Ortiz (@davidortiz) October 11, 2015 
The two star Boston athletes were in a Dunkin' Donuts music video together this summer, singing "Sippin," the self-described "summer chill hit single."
